thread.title: Portaloo falls from moving truck near Cromwell, hits car behind
thread.title_full: Portaloo falls from moving truck near Cromwell, hits car behind

author: Rhys Chamberlain
title: Portaloo falls from moving truck near Cromwell, hits car behind
text:
Portaloo falls from moving truck near Cromwell, hits car behind RHYS CHAMBERLAIN Last updated 14:50, February 14 2017 sahlan hayes 
The portaloo fell from a truck and hit a car. 
A portaloo has fallen from the back of a truck, hitting a car and spreading faeces across the road, police say. 
A police spokeswoman said the incident happened on the Cromwell-Clyde Rd about 6km from Cromwell about 1.40pm. 
Did you see this accident? Email 
Initial reports indicated the portable toilet came off the back of the truck and hit the car behind, she said. 
"The vehicle is damaged but the occupants seem OK," she said. 
Minor debris and faecal matter was on the road and the Fire Service had been called for a wash down, the spokeswoman said. 
More soon.
